meanings.definition: To change or move something slightly in order to make it more suitable or effective.
meanings.sent1: She adjusts the chair to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: He adjusts the volume on the TV to hear better.
meanings.sent3: The cat adjusts its position on the windowsill to catch the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled craftsman, he adjusts the details until they are just right.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she adjusts the painting to hang straight.

meanings.definition: To adapt or become accustomed to new conditions or circumstances.
meanings.sent1: After moving to a new country, she adjusts to the different culture.
meanings.sent2: He quickly adjusts to the fast pace of the city life.
meanings.sent3: The robot adjusts to its new programming and starts functioning perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Like a chameleon, she adjusts to blend in with her surroundings.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he adjusts to the challenges and overcomes them.
